pages.title: Eclipse Set
pages.text: Crafted at the $(item)Altar Core$() using $(item)Eclipse Core$() + Meteorite Armor + enemy drops.$(br2)$(l)Set Bonus:$()$(br)$(li)Night Vision$(li)Life Steal on hit$(li)Enemies nearby are weakened$(li)Fall damage immunity$(br2)$(l)Pieces:$() Eclipse Crown, Eclipse Armor, Eclipse Greaves, Eclipse Boots, Eclipse Blade

pages.title: Stellar Endgame Set
pages.text: Crafted at the $(item)Altar Core$() using $(item)Stellar Heart$() + Stellar Armor + materials.$(br2)$(l)Set Bonus:$()$(br)$(li)Massive mana pool$(li)Fast regeneration$(li)Water walking$(li)Jump boost$(br2)$(l)Pieces:$() Stellar Diadem, Stellar Vestment, Stellar Pants, Stellar Sabatons, Stellar Scepter
